book_title: Python OOP: An Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming
book_instructions: This book is an introduction to object-oriented programming in Python. It is targeted at beginners who know the basics of Python programming and want to learn object-oriented concepts in Python. The book should be written in a clear and concise manner, using simple language and examples that are easy to follow. It is important to emphasize the practical applications of OOP in Python, and how it can be used to build real-world projects. The tone should be friendly and approachable, but also authoritative and informative. It is important to note that while the author has personal experience in the subject, this should not be mentioned explicitly and the author should not be talked about in the book.
